name: tdrgtrg

stmt.origin: simp1bi(wcel(c0, ctdrg), wcel(c0, ctrg), wcel(c0, cdr), wcel(co(cfv(cmgp, c0), cress, cfv(cui, c0)), ctgp))
stmt.pretty: simp1bi(c0 ∈ TopDRing, c0 ∈ TopRing, c0 ∈ DivRing, ((mulGrp ` c0)[|`s](Unit ` c0))∈ TopGrp)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ctdrg), wcel(c0, ctrg))
-| wb(wcel(c0, ctdrg), w3a(wcel(c0, ctrg), wcel(c0, cdr), wcel(co(cfv(cmgp, c0), cress, cfv(cui, c0)), ctgp)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ TopDRing → c0 ∈ TopRing)
⊣ (c0 ∈ TopDRing ↔(c0 ∈ TopRing ∧ c0 ∈ DivRing ∧((mulGrp ` c0)[|`s](Unit ` c0))∈ TopGrp))
